items.title: Wisconsin top court delivers win for environmentalists in 'forever chemicals' fight
items.description: The Wisconsin Supreme Court has delivered a victory for environmentalists in the battle over the regulation of “forever chemicals” known as PFAS

items.title: Tropical Storm Andrea, first of Atlantic hurricane season, has formed
items.description: The National Hurricane Center says Tropical Storm Andrea has formed in the Atlantic Ocean

items.title: Minnesota lawmaker shot to death at home to lie in state at Capitol ahead of funeral

items.title: Powell says Fed can wait to reduce interest rates as Trump demands cuts
items.description: The Federal Reserve will continue to wait and see how the economy evolves before deciding whether to reduce its key interest rate, Chair Jerome Powell...

items.title: New York votes in mayoral primary as Cuomo tries a comeback. Zohran Mamdani stands in his way
items.description: New York City voters will decide whether Andrew Cuomo has done enough to make a political comeback by winning the Democratic mayoral primary
